title: Sharpe's Battle [7 of 15]
description:
[center][i][b]Sharpe's Battle[/b][/i][/center]


[center]Pyrennees, September 1813

Sharpe is given the task of preparing the glamorous Royal 
Irish Company, led by Lord Kiely, for their first encounter with 
the enemy. Previously only used for ceremonial duties, the 
Company finds Sharpe a hard taskmaster. Trouble arises 
amongst the Irish soldiers when false reports are circulated 
of a massacre in Ireland perpetrated by the English. 
When Lord Kiely begins a passionate affair with Juanita, the 
Spanish partisan leader, the distressed Lady Kiely looks to 
Sharpe for comfort. Then Sharpe is led into a French trap and 
he and the Royal Irish Company find themselves up against 
the vicious Brigadier Loup and seemingly impossible odds. 

Cast: 
Sean Bean as Lt. Richard Sharpe
Brian Cox as Major Hogan
Daragh O'Malley as Sgt. Patrick Harper
Assumpta Serna as Teresa Moreno
David Troughton asGeneral Sir Arthur Wellesley[/center]
